item.title: Novak Djokovic Has To Leave Australia After His COVID Vaccine Exemption Visa Was Canceled
item.description:
The decision means the top-ranked tennis player will likely miss the Australian Open. “They expect to be on the flight back home later in the day,” a source told BuzzFeed News.

item.title: Photos Show A Year Of Catastrophic Events Due To Climate Change
item.description:
We looked back at the year in climate change and the disasters we'll be seeing more often as our world is altered by climate-polluting fossil fuels.

item.dc:creator: Pia Peterson

item.title: Satellite Images Show Russian Military Forces Keep Massing Near Ukraine’s Border
item.description:
Satellite images provided to BuzzFeed News and a slew of social media videos show that new Russian troops and heavy artillery were moved to strategic locations right around Biden and Putin’s virtual summit.
